Verses: 1 vaaraththin Mudhalaamnaal Adhikaalaiyile Thaangal Aayaththampannina Andha Kandhavarkkangalai Avargal Eduththukkondu Veru Sila Sthireegalodunkoodak Kallaraiyinidaththil Vandhaargal.
2 kallaraiyai Adaiththirundha Kal Purattith Thallappattirukkiradhaik Kandu,
3 ulle Piravesiththu, Karththaraagiya Yesuvin Sareeraththaik Kaanaamal,
4 adhaik Kuriththu Migundha Kalakkamadaindhirukkaiyil, Piragaasamulla Vasthirandhariththa Iranduper Avargal Aruge, Nindraargal.
5 andha Sthireegal Bayappattuth Thalaikavizhndhu Tharaiyai Nokki Nirkaiyil, Andha Iranduperum Avargalai Nokki: Uyirodirukkiravarai Neengal Mariththoridaththil Thedugiradhenna?
6 avar Inge Illai, Avar Uyirththezhundhaar.

7 manushakumaaran Paavigalaana Manushar Kaigalil Oppukkodukkappadavum, Siluvaiyil Araiyappadavum, Moondraamnaalil Ezhundhirukkavum Vendumenbadhaaga Avar Galileyaavilirundha Kaalaththil Ungalukkuch Sonnadhai Ninaivukoorungal Endraargal.
8 appozhudhu Avargal Avarudaiya Vaarththaigalai Ninaivukoorndhu,
9 kallaraiyai Vittuth Thirumbip Poi, Indhach Sangadhigalellaavatraiyum Padhinoruvarukkum Matrellaarukkum Ariviththaargal.
10 ivaigalai Apposthalarukkuch Sonnavargal Magadhalenaa Mariyaalum, Yovannaalum, Yaakkobin Thaayaagiya Mariyaalum Ivargaludanekooda Irundha Matra Sthireegalume.
11 ivargaludaiya Vaarththaigal Avargalukku Veenpechchaagath Thondrinadhinaal, Avargal Ivargalai Nambavillai.

12 pedhuruvo Ezhundhirundhu Kallaraiyinidaththirku Odi, Adharkulle Kunindhupaarkkaiyil, Seelaigalaith Thanippada Vaiththirukkakkandu, Sambaviththadhaik Kuriththuth Thannil Aachchariyappattukkonduponaan.
13 andraiyadhiname Avargalil Iranduper Erusalemukku Ezhu Alladhu Ettu Mail Dhooramaana Emmaavu Ennum Giraamaththukkup Ponaargal.
14 pogaiyil Indha Varththamaanangal Yaavaiyunguriththu Avargal Oruvarodoruvar Pesikkondaargal.
15 ippadi Avargal Pesi, Sambaashiththukkondirukkaiyil, Yesu Thaame Serndhu Avargaludanekooda Nadandhuponaar.
16 aanaalum Avarai Ariyaadhapadikku Avargaludaiya Kangal Maraikkappattirundhadhu.
17 appozhudhu Avar Avarkalai Nokki: Neengal Dhukkamugamullavargalaai Vazhinadandhu, Oruvarukkoruvar Sollikkollugira Kaariyangal Ennavendru Kettaar.
18 avargalil Oruvanaagiya Kileyoppaa Enbavan Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Innaatkalil Erusalemile Nadandhavaigalai Ariyaadhapadikku Neer Anniyaraayirukkireero Endraan.

19 avar: Evaigal Endraar. Adharku Avargal. Nasareyanaagiya Yesuvaik Kuriththavaigale; Avar Dhevanukku Munbaagavum Janangalellaarukku Munbaagavum Seygaiyilum Vaakkilum Vallamaiyulla Theerkkadharisiyaayirundhaar.
20 nammudaiya Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Adhigaarigalum Avarai Marana Aakkinaikkutpaduththi, Siluvaiyil Araindhaargal.
21 avare Isravelai Meettiratchippavar Endru Naangal Nambiyirundhom Ivaigal Sambaviththu Indru Moondru Naalaagiradhu.
22 aanaalum Engal Koottaththaich Serndha Sila Sthireegal Adhigaalame Kallaraiyinidaththirkuppoi,
23 avarudaiya Sareeraththaik Kaanaamal, Thirumbivandhu, Avar Uyirodirukkiraarendru Sonna Dhevadhooraith Tharisiththom Endru Solli, Engalaip Biramikkappanninaargal.
24 appozhudhu Engalile Silar Kallaraiyinidaththirkup Poi, Sthireegal Sonnapadiye Kandaargal; Avaraiyo Kaanavillai Endraargal,
25 appozhudhu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Theerkkadharisigal Sonna Yaavaiyum Visuvaasikkiradharkup Buththiyillaadha Mandha Irudhayamullavargale,
26 kiristhu Ivvidhamaagap Paadupadavum, Thamadhu Magimaiyil Piravesikkavum Vendiyadhillaiyaa Endru Solli,
27 mose Mudhaliya Sagala Theerkkadharisigalum Ezhudhina Vedhavaakkiyangalellaavatrilum Thammaikkuriththuch Solliyavaigalai Avargalukku Vivariththuk Kaanbiththaar.
28 aththarunaththil Thaangal Pogira Giraamaththukkuch Sameebamaanaargal. Appozhudhu Avar Appuram Pogiravar Polak Kaanbiththaar.
29 avargal Avarai Nokki: Neer Engaludane Thangiyirum, Saayangaalamaayitru, Pozhudhum Poyitru Endru Avarai Varundhik Kettukkondaargal. Appozhudhu Avar Avargaludane Thangumpadi Ulle Ponaar.
30 avargalode Avar Pandhiyirukkaiyil, Avar Appaththai Eduththu, Aaseervadhiththu, Adhaippittu, Avargalukkuk Koduththaar.
31 appozhudhu Avargaludaiya Kangal Thirakkappattu, Avarai Arindhaargal. Udane Avar Avargalukku Maraindhuponaar.

32 appozhudhu Avargal Oruvaraiyoruvar Nokki: Vazhiyile Avar Nammudane Pesi, Vedhavaakkiyangalai Namakku Vilangakkaattinapozhudhu, Nammudaiya Irudhayam Namakkulle Kozhundhuvittu Eriyavillaiyaa Endru Sollikkondu,
33 annerame Ezhundhirundhu, Erusalemukkuth Thirumbippoi, Padhinoruvarum Avargalodirundhavargalum Koodiyirukkakkandu:
34 karththar Meyyaagave Uyirththezhundhu Seemonukkuth Dharisanamaanaarendru Avargal Sollak Kettu,
35 vazhiyil Natandhavaikalaiyum, Avar Appaththaip Pitkaiyil Thaangal Avarai Arindhukontadhaiyum Vivariththuch Chonnaarkal.
36 ivaigalaikkuriththu Avargal Pesikkondirukkaiyil, Yesu Thaame Avargal Naduvile Nindru: Ungalukkuch Samaadhaanam Endraar.
37 avargal Kalangi, Bayandhu, Oru Aaviyaik Kaangiradhaaga Ninaiththaargal.
38 avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengal En Kalangugireergal; Ungal Irudhayangalil Sandhegangal Ezhumbugiradhenna?

39 naandhaan Endru Ariyumpadi En Kaigalaiyum En Kaalgalaiyum Paarungal, Ennaith Thottuppaarungal; Neengal Kaangirapadi, Enakku Maamsamum Elumbugalum Undaayirukkiradhupola Oru Aavikku Iraadhe Endru Solli,
40 thammudaiya Kaigalaiyum Kaalgalaiyum Avargalukkuk Kaanbiththaar.
41 aanaalum Sandhoshaththinaal Avargal Innum Visuvaasiyaamal Aachchariyappadugaiyil: Pusikkiradharku Edhaagilum Inge Undaa Endru Avargalidaththil Kettaar.
42 appozhudhu Poriththa Meenkandaththaiyum Thenkoottuth Thunikkaiyaiyum Avarukkuk Koduththaargal.
43 avaigalai Avar Vaangi Avargalukku Munbaagap Pusiththu,

44 avargalai Nokki: Moseyin Niyaayappiramaanaththilum Theerkkadharisigalin Aagamangalilum Sangeedhangalilum Ennaik Kuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkiravaigalellaam Niraiveravendiyadhendru, Naan Ungalodirundhapodhu Ungalukkuch Sollikkonduvandha Viseshangal Ivaigale Endraar.
45 appozhudhu Vedhavaakkiyangalai Arindhukollumpadi Avargaludaiya Manadhai Avar Thirandhu Avargalai Nokki:
46 ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Kirisdhu Paadupadavum, Moondraamnaalil Mariththorilirundhezhundhirukkavum Vendiyadhaayirundhadhu;
47 andriyum Mananthirumbudhalum Paavamannippum Erusalem Thodangich Sagaladhesaththaarukkum Avarudaiya Naamaththinaale Pirasangikkappadavum Vendiyadhu.
48 neengal Ivaigalukkuch Saatchigalaayirukkireergal.
49 en Pidhaa Vaakkuththaththampanninadhai, Idho, Naan Ungalukku Anuppugiren. Neengalo Unnathdhathilirundhu Varum Belanaal Tharippikkappadum Varaikkum Erusalem Nagaraththil Irungal Endraar.
50 pinbu Avar Beththaaniyaavaraikkum Avargalai Azhaiththukkondupoi, Thammudaiya Kaigalai Uyarththi, Avargalai Aaseervadhiththaar.
51 avargalai Aaseervadhikkaiyil, Avargalai Vittup Pirindhu, Paralogaththukku Eduththukkollappattaar.
52 avargal Avaraip Panindhukondu, Migundha Sandhoshaththode Erusalemukkuth Thirumbi Vandhu.
53 naadorum Dhevaalayaththile Dhevanaip Pugazhndhu Thudhiththukkondirundhaargal. Aamen.
